title: Port pulse-remote-web to React Native
description: Small, LLM-friendly checklist to guide porting the pulse-remote-web app to React Native using the pulse-remote websocket server and REST API.

steps.step: Inspect pulse-remote-web architecture and feature set
List core screens and user flows to port
Map REST and websocket endpoints from swagger/types
Identify shared domain models and types for reuse
Set up React Native project structure for screens and services
Build websocket client wrapper with reconnect and ping/pong
Create REST API client with base URL and interceptors
Port UI for devices/sinks list with sliders
Port UI for device details and controls
Port control interactions (send commands, receive state)
Handle real-time updates from websocket across screens
Implement error, loading, and empty states
Add navigation structure and deep links if needed
Add basic theming and reusable components
Test flows against pulse-remote server (mock or live)
Verify feature parity with web and note gaps
